# ğŸ” Cyberpunk Password Generator

![Cyberpunk Password Generator](https://img.shields.io/badge/Cyberpunk-Password%20Generator-cyan?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

A stylish and futuristic password generator with a cyberpunk aesthetic. This web application allows you to generate secure passwords with a unique visual style inspired by the world of Cyberpunk 2077.

## âœ¨ Features

- ğŸ”’ Generate strong, customizable passwords
- ğŸ“Š Visual password strength meter
- ğŸšï¸ Adjustable password length (8-32 characters)
- ğŸ”£ Character type selection (uppercase, lowercase, numbers, symbols)
- ğŸ“‹ One-click copy to clipboard
- ğŸ“± Responsive design for all devices
- ğŸ’¾ Password history with localStorage
- âŒ¨ï¸ Keyboard shortcuts for power users
- ğŸ¨ Immersive cyberpunk UI with animations

## ğŸ–¥ï¸ Screenshots

![Cyberpunk Password Generator](https://via.placeholder.com/800x450.png?text=Cyberpunk+Password+Generator)

## ğŸš€ Getting Started

Simply open the `cyberpunk-password-generator-v2.html` file in any modern web browser to use the application.

### Keyboard Shortcuts

- `Space` - Generate a new password
- `Ctrl+C` - Copy and save password
- `â†‘` or `â†’` - Increase password length
- `â†“` or `â†` - Decrease password length
- `S` - Manually save to history
- `?` - Show keyboard shortcuts

## ğŸ”§ Technologies Used

- HTML5
- CSS3 with modern animations
- Vanilla JavaScript
- LocalStorage API

## ğŸ› ï¸ Development

This project is built with vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript without dependencies. To modify:

1. Clone the repository
2. Open the HTML file in your preferred editor
3. Make your changes
4. Test by opening in a browser

The design and visuals are inspired by:
- [Cyberpunk 2077](https://www.cyberpunk.net/)
